message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with exceptional features and benefits that we believe could significantly enhance your experience. Given its quality and capabilities, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. Would you like to explore purchasing this product for $15000?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. Would you be willing to consider a lower price? I'm willing to pay up to $12000 for this product.
